mapper.update: UPDATE movie_likes ml INNER JOIN movie m ON ml.movieSeq = m.movieSeq SET ml.movieLike = ml.movieLike + 1, m.movielike = m.movielike + 1 WHERE ml.user_id = #{user_id} AND ml.movieSeq = #{movieSeq}
UPDATE movielikes ml INNER JOIN movie m ON ml.movie_id = m.movie_id SET ml.likes = ml.likes - 1, m.movielike = m.movielike - 1 WHERE ml.user_id = #{userId} AND ml.movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.select: SELECT movielike FROM movie ORDER BY movielike DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}
